Reviews.Content: thirty lived blocks washington square hotel husband visit nyc days celebrate 65th birthday decided stay newly refurbished hotel couldnt choice staff extremely friendly helpful art deco decor nice forget size day anyway inroom safe handy terry cloth robes iron hair dryer provided beds comfortable nice quilts entire hotel clean clean clean complimentary breakfast extra bonus wonderful start day excellent selection rolls fruit bagels little pastries cereal yogurt washing square hotel stay future nyc visits

Reviews.Title: “It's all about location”
Reviews.Author: Eva The Hague
Reviews.Content: location perfect 2 minutes subway neighbourhood nice clean street noise absolutely horrible solved changing double glazed windows single glazed fixed sellotape scotch tape bed extremely uncomfortable slept badly self service breakfast poor boring served breakfast extra cost wait 1520 minutes seated staff ok friendly sometimes rude surely hated job absolutely lovely im york time am hotel
